content: स्थावर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [स्था-वरच्] {@--1@} Fixed to one spot, stable, stationary, immoveable, inanimate (<ab>opp.</ab> जंगम); शरीरिणां स्थावरजंगमानां सुखाय तज्जन्मदिनं बभूव <ls>Ku. 1. 23</ls>, <ls n="Ku.">6. 67</ls>, <ls n="Ku. 6.">73.</ls> {@--2@} Inert, inactive, slow. {@--3@} Regular, established. --रः A mountain; स्थावराणां हिमालयः <ls>Bg. 10. 25.</ls> --रं {@--1@} Any stationary or inanimate object (such as clay, stones, trees &c. which formed the seventh creation of Brahman; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Ms. 1. 41</ls>); मान्यः स मे स्थावरजंगमानां सर्गस्थितिप्रत्यवहारहेतुः <ls>R. 2. 44</ls>; <ls>Ku. 6. 58.</ls> {@--2@} A bowstring. {@--3@} Immoveable property, real estate. {@--4@} A heir-loom.
